feed.title: Wizideals
feed.subtitle: Welcome to Wizideals, your one-stop destination for unbeatable deals and discounts! We are a curated website that scours the internet to bring you the best deals on a wide variety of products and services. Our team of experts works tirelessly to find the latest and greatest deals on everything from clothing to shooes, accessories and beauty products. We only feature deals from trusted retailers and brands, so you can shop with confidence knowing you're getting a great value for your money. At Wizideals, we understand that everyone loves a great deal, which is why we strive to bring you the best discounts and promotions on a wide range of products. We've got you covered. We also have a special section for time-limited deals, so you never miss out on a great opportunity to save. And with new deals added regularly, you'll always find something new and exciting on our website. So why wait? Browse our selection of deals today and start saving on your favorite products and services. Happy shopping with Wizideals!

entry.title: T7 Woven Women’s Skirt
entry.content:
PRODUCT STORY

Cop a signature street style silhouette with our T7 line, named after its iconic namesake design – the 7 cm racing stripes that catapulted PUMA into fashion stardom. Our T7 Woven Skirt features a cheeky silhouette paired with the latest in our windCELL and water repellent technologies for all-weather fashion and function.

FEATURES & BENEFITS

  • Contains Recycled Materials: Made with recycled fibers. One of PUMA’s answers to reduce our environmental impact.

  • WATER REPELLENT: PUMA’s solution for water repellent coating on shell fabric to stay protected from the rain

  • windCELL: PUMA’s designation for highly functional materials that provide a durable yet breathable protection against wind chill while helping maintain body temperature during exercise

DETAILS

  • Regular fit

  • Short length

  • Elastic waistband with external drawcord for customised comfort

  • Side pockets

  • T7 panel inserts

  • PUMA Archive No. 1 Logo rubber print

Material Information

  • Lining: 100% polyester

  • Shell: 100% nylon

entry.title: CLOUDSPUN Marathon Women’s Running Tee
entry.content:
PRODUCT STORY

Taking part in endurance sports doesn’t mean you have to compromise on comfort. Our CLOUDSPUN line presents athleticism at its most essential, demonstrating that for the serious runner impeccably engineered gear and uncompromising comfort count. Our CLOUDSPUN Marathon Running Tee is an innovative layer engineered with CLOUDSPUN and dryCELL technologies to keep you at the height of comfort from your first mile to your last.

FEATURES & BENEFITS

  • CLOUDSPUN: PUMA’s ultra-soft, moisture-wicking fabric with four-way stretch for unrestricted range of motion and comfort

  • dryCELL: PUMA’s designation for moisture-wicking properties that help keep you dry and comfortable

DETAILS

  • Regular fit

  • Crew neck

  • FlexVent breathable, elastic trim

  • Strategically placed mesh to enhance breathability and provide ultimate ventilation

  • Reflective design elements

  • PUMA Cat Logo at left chest

Material Information

  • Mesh: 82% polyester, 18% elastane

  • Shell: 94% polyester, 6% elastane

Care Instructions

  • Do not use fabric softener

  • Do not iron print

  • Use only mild detergent

  • Wash and iron inside out

  • Wash with similar colours

entry.title: Courtflex v2 Slip-On Kids’ Trainers
entry.content:
Say hello to our new kids’ specific court-inspired trainer for everyday wear. They’re easy to get on and off thanks to the wider instep and slip-on construction, and the extra…

  • Style: 374858_03

  • Colour: Pink Lady-Celandine

Shipping and Returns

PRODUCT STORY

Say hello to our new kids’ specific court-inspired trainer for everyday wear. They’re easy to get on and off thanks to the wider instep and slip-on construction, and the extra width and height in the toe area means even more space for little feet to move. Stretchy neoprene fabric in vibrant colours combined with PUMA’s iconic branding make for a trendy look.

FEATURES & BENEFITS

  • CMEVA: PUMA’s compression-moulded EVA material for lightweight performance

DETAILS

  • Low boot silhouette

  • Branded sockliner

  • Stretchy neoprene upper

  • EVA midsole

  • Grippy EVA outsole

  • Slip-on construction improved fit and increased instep width

  • Tongue and heel webbings for easy on/off

  • PUMA Formstrip detailing on lateral side

  • PUMA Cat Logo on tongue and heel webbings

  • PUMA Kids’ style: Recommended for young kids between 4 and 8 years
entry.summary: PRODUCT STORY Say hello to our new kids' specific court-inspired trainer for everyday wear. They're easy to get on and off thanks to the wider instep and slip-on construction, and the extra width and height in the toe area means even more space f...

entry.title: Crystal Galaxy High Tight Women’s Shorts

link.title: Crystal Galaxy High Tight Women’s Shorts

entry.content:
PRODUCT STORY

Experience a whole new wavelength in our Crystal Galaxy collection, inspired by modern trends to deliver looks that are chill vibes only. Our Crystal Galaxy High Waisted Shorts are an on-trend warm weather staple that effortlessly pairs style and performance, featuring an abstract all-over print.

FEATURES & BENEFITS

  • Recycled Content: Made with at least 20% recycled material as a step toward a better future

  • miDori®: Made with the bio-based finishing treatment miDori® bioWick.

DETAILS

  • Tight fit

  • High waist

  • Elasticated waistband

  • Above-knee length

  • AOP warning: Product with all-over-printed graphics might not exactly match the images

  • PUMA Archive No.1 Logo at left leg

Material Information

  • Shell: 77% polyester, 23% elastane

Care Instructions

  • Do not iron print

  • Wash garment in a washing bag

  • Wash and iron inside out

  • Wash separately

  • Use only mild detergent
